reviewText: I have been interested in surface design for a long time but never took the plunge to learn how to do it.  This was a good introduction to the art of surface design in general and to the 4 processes discussed specifically.  I have to say, though, that my favorite part was getting to "meet" Jane Dunnewold.  She is talented and down to earth and I liked her instantly.

This DVD is an excellent resource for anyone who enjoys working with fabric.  Jane Dunnewold is a wonderful teacher, and she explains the projects with clear step-by-step instructions.  Examples of some of her completed projects demonstrate how versatile and powerful these techniques can be.  With Jane to guide you, you should not be afraid to try these techniques, nor should you be reluctant to layer images which will result in beautiful and interesting effects.  The essence of this kind of work is experimentation, so jump in and relish the great images you will create.
